1.0.0.name: wordpress/hp-jquery-animated-tag-cloud
1.0.0.description:
Give your tag cloud some nice look and animation, use this plugin to make your tag cloud more attractive. more updates will come soon... Visit Plugin URL http://hardik.me/blog/index.php/2011/02/04/wordpress-jquery-animated-tag-cloud/

Features

  • Animated Tag cloud
  • Can set background options.
  • Easy to use, not much configuration required.

List of my WordPress Plugins

  • HP - Picasa Web Album Photos
  • Generate Social Network Profie QR Code.
  • YouTube Video Plugin to show YouTube Videos from widgets.
